LanguageData.SetHarvestProportionDesc: Set how many plants need to be fully grown for this zone to be harvested.\n\nCurrently set to {0}% or {1} of {2} plants.
LanguageData.SetHarvestProportionSliderText: Set harvest % to {0}.\nHarvest when {1} out of {2} plants grown.
LanguageData.WarningHarvestSetToZero: Cannot set to harvest when 0 plants are grown.
LanguageData.SettingAlwaysHarvestDesc: Plants in this zone will always be harvested.
LanguageData.SettingNeverHarvestDesc: Plants in this zone will never be harvested.
LanguageData.SettingSyncHarvestDesc: Plants in this zone will be harvested when {0}% ({1} of {2}) of plants are harvestable.
